text: Hey Guys, Im creating an email for a client and they are using Outlook 2010. I can not seem to make the headline go full width in there outlook. In the HubSpot Tester its fine just not working in there outlook any ideas?
Hard to say without seeing your code
Or if that's a screenshot of it broken in Outlook or correct in some other place
<@U4F337UM8>  here is a good resource for css in emails: <https://www.campaignmonitor.com/css/>
I haven't made many emails lately, but I refer back to this when I do
<@U2Q5LPHGS> pinned a message to this channel.

Anyone else not able to create landing pages or website pages in their sites at the moment? Our team is unable to on multiple sites right now, and we thought weâ€™d check here as well. Thank you in advance.

I don't suppose you're getting something like this:
```Access Denied

You don't have permission to access "<http://app.HubSpot.com/myaccounts>" on this server.
Reference #18.c276b9d0.1496342868.879a008```
I've been getting that off and on for the past few days. It usually fixes if I clear my cookies for the domain or restart my browser
I usually log out back in if I have issues like what you guys are having
okay thanks <@U3A4KEWK1> and <@U25PYL3Q8> it appears to have come back from the dead after a little while :wink:
